verses.verse: Now <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> was <S%H2204>old<s%> and <S%H935>stricken<s%> in <S%H3117>years;<s%> and they <S%H3680>covered<s%> him with <S%H899>clothes,<s%> but he got <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3179>heat.<s%>

Why his <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, Let there be <S%H1245>sought<s%> for my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> a <S%H5291>young<s%> <S%H1330>virgin:<s%> and let her <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> and let her <S%H5532>cherish<s%> him, and let her <S%H7901>lie<s%> in your <S%H2436>bosom,<s%> that my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> may get <S%H2552>heat.<s%>

So they <S%H1245>sought<s%> for a <S%H3303>fair<s%> <S%H5291>damsel<s%> throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1366>coasts<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H49>Abishag<s%> a <S%H7767>Shunammite,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> her to the <S%H4428>king.<s%>

And the <S%H5291>damsel<s%> was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3303>fair,<s%> and <S%H5532>cherished<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> and <S%H8334>ministered<s%> to him: but the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> her not.

Then <S%H138>Adonijah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2294>Haggith<s%> <S%H5375>exalted<s%> himself, <S%H559>saying,<s%> I will be <S%H4427>king:<s%> and he <S%H6213>prepared<s%> him <S%H7393>chariots<s%> and <S%H6571>horsemen,<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> to <S%H7323>run<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him.

And his <S%H1>father<s%> had not <S%H6087>displeased<s%> him at any <S%H3117>time<s%> in <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4069>Why<s%> have you <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H3602>so?<s%> and he <S%H1571>also<s%> was a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2896>goodly<s%> man; and his mother bore him <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H53>Absalom.<s%>

And he <S%H1961>conferred<s%> <S%H1697><s%> with <S%H3097>Joab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6870>Zeruiah,<s%> and with <S%H54>Abiathar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest:<s%> and they <S%H310>following<s%> <S%H138>Adonijah<s%> <S%H5826>helped<s%> him.

But <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3111>Jehoiada,<s%> and <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> and <S%H8096>Shimei,<s%> and <S%H7472>Rei,<s%> and the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> men <S%H834>which<s%> belonged to <S%H1732>David,<s%> were not with <S%H138>Adonijah.<s%>

And <S%H138>Adonijah<s%> <S%H2076>slew<s%> <S%H6629>sheep<s%> and <S%H1241>oxen<s%> and <S%H4806>fat<s%> <S%H4806>cattle<s%> by the <S%H68>stone<s%> of <S%H2120>Zoheleth,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is by <S%H5883>Enrogel,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H251>brothers<s%> the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H5650>servants:<s%>
But <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> and <S%H1141>Benaiah,<s%> and the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> men, and <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> his <S%H251>brother,<s%> he <S%H7121>called<s%> not.

Why <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H1339>Bathsheba<s%> the <S%H517>mother<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Have you not <S%H8085>heard<s%> that <S%H138>Adonijah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2294>Haggith<s%> does <S%H4427>reign,<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> our <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H3045>knows<s%> it not?

<S%H6258>Now<s%> therefore <S%H3212>come,<s%> let me, I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, give you <S%H6098>counsel,<s%> that you may <S%H4422>save<s%> your own <S%H5315>life,<s%> and the <S%H5315>life<s%> of your <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon.<s%>

<S%H3212>Go<s%> and <S%H935>get<s%> you in to <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to him, Did not you, my <S%H113>lord,<s%> O <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H7650>swear<s%> to your <S%H519>handmaid,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3588>Assuredly<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> your <S%H1121>son<s%> shall <S%H4427>reign<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> me, and he shall <S%H3427>sit<s%> on my <S%H3678>throne?<s%> <S%H4069>why<s%> then does <S%H138>Adonijah<s%> <S%H4427>reign?<s%>

<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> while you <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H1696>talk<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> with the <S%H4428>king,<s%> I also will <S%H935>come<s%> in <S%H310>after<s%> you, and <S%H4390>confirm<s%> your <S%H1697>words.<s%>

And <S%H1339>Bathsheba<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> in to the <S%H4428>king<s%> into the <S%H2315>chamber:<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2204>old;<s%> and <S%H49>Abishag<s%> the <S%H7767>Shunammite<s%> <S%H8334>ministered<s%> to the <S%H4428>king.<s%>
And <S%H1339>Bathsheba<s%> <S%H6915>bowed,<s%> and did <S%H7812>obeisance<s%> to the <S%H4428>king.<s%> And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> would you?

And she <S%H559>said<s%> to him, My <S%H113>lord,<s%> you <S%H7650>swore<s%> by the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> to your <S%H519>handmaid,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3588>Assuredly<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> your <S%H1121>son<s%> shall <S%H4427>reign<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> me, and he shall <S%H3427>sit<s%> on my <S%H3678>throne.<s%>
And <S%H6258>now,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H138>Adonijah<s%> <S%H4427>reigns;<s%> and <S%H6258>now,<s%> my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> you <S%H3045>know<s%> it not:

And he has <S%H2076>slain<s%> <S%H7794>oxen<s%> and <S%H4806>fat<s%> <S%H4806>cattle<s%> and <S%H6629>sheep<s%> in <S%H7230>abundance,<s%> and has <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H4428>king,<s%> and <S%H54>Abiathar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and <S%H3097>Joab<s%> the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H6635>host:<s%> but <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> your <S%H5650>servant<s%> has he not <S%H7121>called.<s%>

And you, my <S%H113>lord,<s%> O <S%H4428>king,<s%> the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> are on you, that you should <S%H5046>tell<s%> them <S%H4310>who<s%> shall <S%H3427>sit<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him.

Otherwise it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, when my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> shall <S%H7901>sleep<s%> with his <S%H1>fathers,<s%> that I and my <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> shall be counted <S%H2400>offenders.<s%>
And, <S%H2009>see,<s%> while she <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H1696>talked<s%> with the <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> also <S%H935>came<s%> in.

And they <S%H5046>told<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold<s%> <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet.<s%> And when he was <S%H935>come<s%> in before the <S%H4428>king,<s%> he <S%H7812>bowed<s%> himself <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> with his <S%H639>face<s%> to the <S%H776>ground.<s%>

And <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> My <S%H113>lord,<s%> O <S%H4428>king,<s%> have you <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H138>Adonijah<s%> shall <S%H4427>reign<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> me, and he shall <S%H3427>sit<s%> on my <S%H3678>throne?<s%>

For he is <S%H3381>gone<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> this <S%H3117>day,<s%> and has <S%H2076>slain<s%> <S%H7794>oxen<s%> and <S%H4806>fat<s%> <S%H4806>cattle<s%> and <S%H6629>sheep<s%> in <S%H7230>abundance,<s%> and has <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H6635>host,<s%> and <S%H54>Abiathar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest;<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> they <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him, and <S%H559>say,<s%> God <S%H2421>save<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> Adonijah.

But me, even me your <S%H5650>servant,<s%> and <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3111>Jehoiada,<s%> and your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> has he not <S%H7121>called.<s%>

Is <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> done by my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> and you have not <S%H3045>showed<s%> it to your <S%H5650>servant,<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> should <S%H3427>sit<s%> on the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him?

Then <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7121>Call<s%> me <S%H1339>Bathsheba.<s%> And she <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H6440>presence,<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7650>swore,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> As the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%> that has <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> out of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H6869>distress,<s%>

<S%H3588>Even<s%> as I <S%H7650>swore<s%> to you by the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3588>Assuredly<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> your <S%H1121>son<s%> shall <S%H4427>reign<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> me, and he shall <S%H3427>sit<s%> on my <S%H3678>throne<s%> in my <S%H8478>stead;<s%> <S%H3588>even<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> will I certainly <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

Then <S%H1339>Bathsheba<s%> <S%H6915>bowed<s%> with her <S%H639>face<s%> to the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and did <S%H7812>reverence<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> Let my <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H2421>live<s%> for <S%H5769>ever.<s%>

And <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7121>Call<s%> me <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> and <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3111>Jehoiada.<s%> And they <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king.<s%>

The <S%H4428>king<s%> also <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H3947>Take<s%> with you the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of your <S%H113>lord,<s%> and cause <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> my <S%H1121>son<s%> to <S%H7392>ride<s%> on my own <S%H6506>mule,<s%> and <S%H3381>bring<s%> him <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H1521>Gihon:<s%>

And let <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> and <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H4886>anoint<s%> him <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and <S%H8628>blow<s%> you with the <S%H7782>trumpet,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> God <S%H2421>save<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon.<s%>

Then you shall <S%H5927>come<s%> up <S%H310>after<s%> him, that he may <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H3427>sit<s%> on my <S%H3678>throne;<s%> for he shall be <S%H4427>king<s%> in my <S%H8478>stead:<s%> and I have <S%H6680>appointed<s%> him to be <S%H5057>ruler<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

And <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3111>Jehoiada<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H543>Amen:<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> too.

As the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H1961>been<s%> with my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> even <S%H3651>so<s%> be he with <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> and make his <S%H3678>throne<s%> greater than the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of my <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David.<s%>

So <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> and <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3111>Jehoiada,<s%> and the <S%H3746>Cherethites,<s%> and the <S%H6432>Pelethites,<s%> <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down,<s%> and caused <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> to <S%H7392>ride<s%> on <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David's<s%> <S%H6506>mule,<s%> and <S%H3212>brought<s%> him to <S%H1521>Gihon.<s%>

And <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> an <S%H7161>horn<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%> out of the <S%H168>tabernacle,<s%> and <S%H4886>anointed<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon.<s%> And they <S%H8628>blew<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpet;<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> God <S%H2421>save<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> up <S%H310>after<s%> him, and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2490>piped<s%> with <S%H2485>pipes,<s%> and <S%H8056>rejoiced<s%> with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8057>joy,<s%> so that the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H1234>rent<s%> with the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of them.

And <S%H138>Adonijah<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7121>guests<s%> that were with him <S%H8085>heard<s%> it as they had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H398>eating.<s%> And when <S%H3097>Joab<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet,<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4069>Why<s%> is this <S%H6963>noise<s%> of the <S%H7151>city<s%> being in an <S%H1993>uproar?<s%>

And while he <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H1696>spoke,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H54>Abiathar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H935>came;<s%> and <S%H138>Adonijah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H935>Come<s%> in; for you are a <S%H2428>valiant<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> and <S%H1319>bring<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1319>tidings.<s%>

And <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H138>Adonijah,<s%> <S%H61>Truly<s%> our <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> has made <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H4427>king.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> has <S%H7971>sent<s%> with him <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> and <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3111>Jehoiada,<s%> and the <S%H3774>Cherethites,<s%> and the <S%H6432>Pelethites,<s%> and they have caused him to <S%H7392>ride<s%> on the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H6506>mule:<s%>

And <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> and <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> have <S%H4886>anointed<s%> him <S%H4428>king<s%> in <S%H1521>Gihon:<s%> and they are <S%H5927>come<s%> up from <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H8056>rejoicing,<s%> so that the <S%H7151>city<s%> <S%H1949>rang<s%> again. <S%H1931>This<s%> is the <S%H6963>noise<s%> that you have <S%H8085>heard.<s%>
And <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H3427>sits<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of the <S%H4410>kingdom.<s%>
